## Description 

This function takes in a data frame, a function, and a filter. The function can be applied to a column of a data frame and return the column of the dataframe. The filter will return either a true or false.


## Use 
Our team used df_apply to to round the lengths and widths of iris petals using the R preset Iris dataframe. This would be useful as average gardeners aren't going to be micro-measuring their iris petals' lengths. To use df_apply to round numbers, simply use the premade function round in the place of .fun. 

iris_function <- df_apply(iris, round, is.numeric)
